article.title: next + react + antd

menus: ## 二、TypeError: Cannot read property 'pathname' of undefined

## 三、Objects are not valid as a React child (found: object with keys {telephone, qq, email}). If you meant to render a collection of children, use an array instead. in div (at index.js:61) in li (at index.js:60) in ul (at index.js:56) in div (at index.js:54) in div (created by Col) in Col (at index.js:53) in div (created by Row) in Row (at index.js:46) in div (created by Col) in Col (at index.js:45) in div (created by Row) in Row (at index.js:33) in div (at index.js:32) in footer (at index.js:31) in Footer (at _app.js:96) in div (at _app.js:93) in Provider (at _app.js:92) in LocaleProvider (at _app.js:91) in Container (at _app.js:90) in App (created by withRouter(App)) in withRouter(App) (created by withRedux(withRouter(App))) in withRedux(withRouter(App)) in ErrorBoundary
## 七、(node:38492) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Unhandled promise rejection (rejection id: 1): TypeError: Cannot read property 'compilation' of undefined
